name: social-chat
description: Aplicacion de escritorio para acceder a chats webs como whatsapp

scripts.cons: electron-packager ./ "multi-chat" --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=0.36.0 --ignore='node_modules' && asar pack multi-chat-linux-x64/resources/app multi-chat-linux-x64/resources/app.asar && rm -r multi-chat-linux-x64/resources/app && rm -r multi-chat-linux-x64/resources/default_app
scripts.conswin: electron-packager ./ "multi-chat" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.36.0 --ignore='node_modules' && asar pack multi-chat-win32-x64/resources/app multi-chat-win32-x64/resources/app.asar && rm -r multi-chat-win32-x64/resources/app && rm -r multi-chat-win32-x64/resources/default_app

author: Benjamin De la Cruz Martinez

_librariesioMetadata.description: Una aplicacion creada con Electron, en esta aplicacion puedes usar distintis tipos de chats web
